name: Class 1
description: Exposure of instrument allows reference level measurements

name: Class 2
description: Exposure of instrument has small or infrequent influence on measurement

name: Class 3
description: Exposure of instrument leads to increased uncertainty or occasional invalid measurements

name: Class 4
description: Exposure of instrument leads to high uncertainty or regular invalid measurements

name: Class 5
description: Exposure of instrument leads to invalid measurements

name: inapplicable
description: None of the codes in the table are applicable in the context of this particular observation
